version_name: 5.0! This update marks our 2 year anniversary

version_description: Bug fixing and improvements to Ad Watch System

Welcome Capitalists to Version 5.0! This update marks our 2 year anniversary, and includes some exciting new features:
- Daily Allowance Gold Subscription. For one low price, you can subscribe to have 10 Gold delivered every day you login for 31 days s
* This update contains stability improvements and general bug fixes.
